welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Campinas, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its beautiful parks, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Campinas has to offer!"

airports.airport_name: Campo dos Amarais–Prefeito Francisco Amaral State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free with a valid boarding pass.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
